description:
Frogger is back, and he's bringing a
whole new dimension with him! Just in
time for his 30th anniversary, Frogger
is back, crossing streets, taking
names and coming at you in 3D! The
excitement of Frogger's timeless
run-and-dodge gameplay is coming to
a Nintendo 3DS near you, with fun
new graphics, novel level twists, and
new friends to help Frogger make it
across the way!
name: Frogger 3D
